Description: A qualified and certified talented individual to maintain and administer company’s systems (workstations/servers) based on MS Windows. The system administrator's responsibilities include troubleshooting hardware, OS, software and networking issues as well as ensuring that all computing operations run with optimal performance and security.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in ICT/Computer Science.
5-7 years’ experience as system engineer with a reputed organization.
Proficiency in reading, writing and speaking English language.
Certification is preferred in MS core infrastructure. The certification may include Azure Administrator Associate, Azure Solutions Architect Expert, Azure Security Engineer Associate etc
A system administrator should have an excellent ability to solve problems using in-depth understanding of information systems and computing solutions.
